data.about_me: Abanob Shenoda, a communications and electronics engineer from Assiut University, excelled in programming starting with C++. Progressing through mobile languages like Java, he delved into web development, mastering HTML, CSS, JS, Bootstrap, and JQuery. Furthering my skills through the EGFWD scholarship, I mastered JavaScript, Fullstack development, Postgres SQL, AWS, Flutter, Dart, React, Next.js, and MongoDB.

degrees.title: Asyut University
degrees.subtitle: B.Sc. in Electrical Engineering - Electronics and Communication
descriptions: ⚡ I specialized in Electronics and Communication Engineering.
⚡ I have studied core subjects related to electrical engineering and communication technologies.
⚡ I graduated with a total grade of 'Good'.

degrees.title: Web Development Foundations
degrees.subtitle: Challenger Web Development Course
descriptions: ⚡ I Created and styled web components.
⚡ I Debuged HTML and CSS code.
⚡ I Built a responsive website layout.

degrees.title: Web Development Professional
degrees.subtitle: Professional Web Development Course
descriptions: ⚡ I Learnt JavaScript , Understood logic and control flow.
⚡ I Created web content, Managed website performance.
⚡ I Worked with Node and Express, Built a webserver.

degrees.title: Web Development Advanced
degrees.subtitle: Advanced Web Development Course
descriptions: ⚡ I learnt TypeScript, created test units with Jasmine. used Express to build APIs.
⚡ I Built a RESTful JSON API with Node and Postgres.
⚡ I Understood essential topics like databases and querying, API architecture, database migrations, REST, CRUD, creating a testing environment, password hashing and route authorization via JWTs.
⚡ I created environment properties in Elastic Beanstalk, created an S3 bucket and configured it for web hosting.
